ingredients.ingredient: 2 (0.3 ounce) packages sugar-free cherry flavored Jell-O® mix

cookingTips: Dissolve gelatin completely in boiling water before adding other ingredients
Let the gelatin set partially before adding pecans so they don't sink
Chill for at least 4 hours until fully set and ready to unmold
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the steps for properly dissolving and setting gelatin salads. Discuss how to time the addition of ingredients to prevent sinking and create layers.
